channel.title: oz2006 on Posts from emeraldjava
channel.description: Recent content in oz2006 on Posts from emeraldjava

item.title: June 2nd 2006 - Melbourne to Sorrento
item.description: Chapel Street Backpacker The first 20km was on a dedicated bike lane, with the only hazards being the morning pram walkers. Joined the Nepean highway near chelsea and followed it down via Frankston, Mornington and St Marta. The bike lane on the main road was really wide and most vehicals gave me plently of room. 2006-06-02-beach Hauling the fully loaded bags on the bike finally kicked in about 40km. I was expecting the first couple of days to be tough, but not this bad this early.

item.title: Thursday 1st June 2006
item.description: Just chilled around melbourne again today, sorted an aussie mobile number [0448 997 380 ] and some replacement tubes for the bike. Toured around CBD, victoria market, richmond, fitzroy and the MCG today. 2006-06-01 The plan tomorrow is to cycle down the Mornington Peninsula, use the ferry to cross the bay and spend the night in Torquay.

item.title: Wednesday 31th May 2006
item.description: Moved to a hostel in St Kilda today for 2 nights, the CBD is dead at night. Spent the rest of the day touring around melbourne, its so easy having your own transport to just skip past places. Did a lap of the albert park grand prix circuit, not sure if i was on the same pace as the F1 dudes. Picture of the Melbourne skyline taken from albert park in the last afternoon.

item.title: Tuesday 30th May 2006
item.description: In Hong Kong International airport for a 2 hour stopover before the final leg of the flight to melbourne, which should get me there for 19.30 this evening. 2006-05-30 Interesting landing into melbourne, I’m looking out the window to see the city lights expecting to have a nice view for a few minutes before we touch down, but first lights i see are the airport lights. There a bit close i’m thinking, when next thing the plane slaps the runway like a tonne of bricks, or metal hitting the ground.

item.title: Monday 29th May 2006
item.description: Monday 29th May 2006 Flew from London Heathrow T4 (12.20pm) to Hong Kong with Quantas today.
